page.title: 18PONY TREKKING CONTINUED
page.content: Some of the places which are visited on the treks include Inchrory, Achlichnie, Delnabo and the Country Walk at Delavorar. The treks take you through pine forests, across moorlands and mountains which give the Trekkers every chance to see the wildlife of the area. This includes deer, grouse, pheasants, partridges, moorland birds, rabbits and hares. The Trekking Centre is usually very busy during the summer and many visitors enjoy their treks around the lovely Tomintoul countryside.
